body.name: VTech KidiBeats Kids Drum Set, Orange
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs
features: Kids learning toy has three drum pads and cymbal each with its own unique sound for sensory development
Toddlers can play along to 9 melodies in styles including rock, dance and pop; music toy teaches letters, numbers, and music
Kids drum set has 4 modes of play: Free Play, Letters, Numbers, and Follow-Along; each drum features a unique LED light
Educational kids toy includes two drumsticks; allow your child to feel like a real drummer
Kids drums are intended for toddlers aged 2 to 5 years old; 3 AA batteries are included for demo, use new batteries for regular use
Development benefits - Visualization Memory, Musical Creativity, Letters Names Phonics
body.description: Product Description Durable Product. If for some reason the program/activity stops working or malfunctions, please follow these steps - Turn the unit OFF,Interrupt the power supply by removing the batteries, Let the unit stand for a few minutes, then replace the batteries, Turn the unit back ON, The unit will now be ready to play again, if the product still does not work, replace with a new set of batteries Brand Story By VTech From the Manufacturer Your child can rock out and learn with the VTech KidiBeats Drum Set. This drum set for kids comes with a pair of drumsticks that can be used to tap the four different electronic learning drums. Your child can drum freestyle or play along to nine pre-set melodies in a variety of musical styles. Or for more structured play, they can follow the lights on the drums as they learn about letters and numbers. With four ways to play and a variety of fun sounds, your child will love learning to the music with this educational toy. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This drum set for kids comes with a pair of drumsticks that can be used to tap the four different electronic drums. Your child can drum freestyle or play along to nine pre-set melodies in a variety of musical styles. Or for more structured play, they can follow the lights on the drums as they hear about letters and numbers. With four ways to play and a variety of fun sounds, your child will love learning to the music! Includes two drumsticks.

This drum set for kids comes with a pair of drumsticks that can be used to tap the four different electronic drums. Your child can drum freestyle or play along to nine pre-set melodies in a variety of musical styles. Or for more structured play, they can follow the lights on the drums as they hear about letters and numbers. With four ways to play and a variety of fun sounds, your child will love learning to the music! Includes two drumsticks.

Features Light Up Drum Pads and Cymbal Use the drumsticks to tap the drum pads and cymbal, each with its own unique sound. Find Your Beat The drum set features nine melodies from four different music genres. Parent Friendly Features Parents will love this drum set too. Automatic shut-off preserves battery life, while volume control allows for quieter play.

4 Ways to Play! Follow Me Use the drumsticks to tap the drum pads and cymbal, each with its own unique sound. Number Jams Hit the drums for counting fun. Alphabets Follow the light to play with letters, phonics and words. Free Style Make up your own song with 16 kinds of drum sounds.

VTech KidiBeats Drum Set VTech Zoo Jamz Stompin' Fun Drums VTech Zoo Jamz Xylophone VTech Zoo Jamz Guitar VTech Mix and Match-a-Saurus VTech DigiArt Creative Easel Item Model Number 80-134400 80-196700 80-174900 80-179000 80-518700 80-193500 Age Range 2-5 Years 1.5-4 Years 1.5-4 Years 1.5-4 Years 2-5 Years 3-6 Years Product Description Learn more than music with VTech's KidiBeats Drum Set. This musical instrument educational toy teaches toddlers letters and numbers in fun interactive ways. An interactive drum kit for kids featuring light-up drum pads, games and songs, so they can follow along or create their own beats. Little musicians can learn music notes and create their own songs with the caterpillar through three interactive modes and multiple levels of fun. Eight light-up buttons and strings allow your little musician to jam to the included music or make their own With the Mix and Match-a-Saurus, kids can create 27 different combinations of emotions, music styles and characters that Dino uses for imaginative play. This fun, interactive easel can be transformed from a light-up dry-erase board to a chalkboard and drawing table for a variety of ways to learn and be creative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Might drive you crazy but kids love it
reviews.reviewText: Interesting little drum set at a great price for little ones - my 2-3 year old enjoys it, and it's held up well. Cute lights and a good size. The settings and options are a little strange but might be more interesting once my kid gets older. The drumsticks are soft, fortunately, and it's fun to see them get interested in music. Several settings to choose from but not much ability to change volume or set-up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Whenever my 4 year and 2 year old play with their drum set, they get really engaged and follow instruction of the recording. It’s very effective, in a good way. They listen, and act. It is giftable, fun and worth the value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fun little drum set for toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: This drum set toy has several settings, and before giving to my great- nephew, I tried it out, and it is a very cool toy, that I know will entertain him for hours! I did not receive the set the 1st time it said it was delivered- but am sure now that it was the delivery service, NOT the sellers fault.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: It’s a cute little drum set, I bought it for my 8 month old because he likes his xylophone that he can bang on. He actually plays with it and it will grow with him. But, it plays music in the background as soon as you turn it on and you have to cycle through all the songs to stop the music. That should be the other way around, it should start off no music that you can then turn on. Then when it’s on no music it constantly talks, and when you are drumming it’s makes its own drum sounds. It is a very small drum set which I already knew, but that’s fine because I got it cheap. It does have two options on the back of it for volume which is awesome. It just could have been executed a little better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for music time without the noise
reviews.reviewText: Great for kids to bang on also not so much noise. Great to engage with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The drum set is smaller than I expected but my son enjoyed playing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well made, good size, and so cute! Bought as a gift for nephew and he loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My nephew loves his drum!
reviews.reviewText: he really likes to play with the drum ......... excellent purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Kids love it. Not too loud so it doesn’t annoy anyone!

reviews.reviewTitle: Rhythm & Sound is important for kids!
reviews.reviewText: My twin granddaughters love this! They are very musical, & this is a lot of fun for them. I wish it came with 4 drumsticks! Lol. I think it is a little expensive & I wish it was a little bigger too.

Mi nieto flipo... Mis hijos me miraron con una cara como diciendo: vaya lata que nos van a dar con la batería! Pero Noooo! Porque tiene control de volumen...además ahora es.uno de los juguetes preferidos de mi nieto.
